dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface TransformerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContextService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextServiceImpl, TransformerRepositoryImpl
public interface TransformerRepository
extends java.rmi.Remote

A Transformer Repository hold a range of Context Transformer, who can transfomr from one (or more) types of context information to another. You can ask the repositoty to get a transformer, by providing the interface type of a transformer.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
See Also:
ContextTransformer, getTransformerRepository

getContextTransformer

ContextTransformer getContextTransformer(java.lang.Class[] in,
                                         java.lang.Class out)
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method return a Context Transfomer that can translate from one or more ContextItem types to another.

Parameters:
in - - an array of the types of ContextItems to transform from
out - - the type of ContextItem to transform to
Returns:
a ContextTranslator, which can transform from 'in' to 'out', or null if no match was found.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
ContextItem
